LanguageData.Cleaning.tooltipDesc: Cleaners wipe up spills and sweep up debris in designated home zones, making the colony more enjoyable to live in.
LanguageData.Hauling.tooltipDesc: Haulers carry things to where they need to be.
LanguageData.Art.tooltipDesc: Artists create beautiful works of art.
LanguageData.Crafting.tooltipDesc: Crafters create things from rough materials.
LanguageData.PlantCutting.tooltipDesc: Plant cutters remove and harvest the wild plants you've designated.
LanguageData.Growing.tooltipDesc: Miners dig out squares that you have designated for mining. If these are mineral squares, they will yield usable minerals.
LanguageData.Mining.tooltipDesc: Growers plant seeds and harvest grown crops.
LanguageData.Repair.tooltipDesc: Repairers fix broken-down buildings and equipment.
LanguageData.Construction.tooltipDesc: Constructors build things that you've designated.
LanguageData.Hunting.tooltipDesc: Hunters kill animals which are designated to be hunted.
LanguageData.Cooking.tooltipDesc: Cooks fill paste dispensers and prepare meals.
LanguageData.Warden.tooltipDesc: Wardens visit prisoners to recruit them, have a nice chat, beat them, or execute them - whatever you have decided. Wardens also deliver food to prisoners.
LanguageData.Doctor.tooltipDesc: Doctors bring food those lying incapacitated in bed. They will care for both colonists and prisoners.
LanguageData.Firefighter.tooltipDesc: Firefighters extinguish fires in the colony.
